text: Virginia Serret was a Mexican film actress.Wood p.142 She appeared in around thirty films during the Golden age of Mexican cinema. Serret was married to the Argentine actor Luis Aldás. ==Selected filmography== * Heads or Tails (1937) * Poor Devil (1940) * Con Su Amable Permiso (1940) * Woman Without a Soul (1944) * Porfirio Díaz (1944) * The Hour of Truth (1945) * Song of the Siren (1948) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Wood, Andrew Grant. Agustin Lara: A Cultural Biography. Oxford University Press, 2014. ==External links== * Category:1914 births Category:1958 deaths Category:Mexican film actresses Category:Actresses from Veracruz Category:20th-century Mexican actresses
title: Virginia Serret
